sentences.english: After dinner my father oftens dozes in his chair for a while.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭后，我的父亲常在他的椅子上小睡片刻。

sentences.english: You may recline your seat a little when you want to have a quick nap.
sentences.chinese: 你想小睡片刻时，可以把你的座位调节得向后仰一点。

sentences.english: If you are at home, take a quick nap for about 20-30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在家里，小睡二三十分钟。

sentences.english: Even one cup of caffeinated tea will throw me off, either causing me to need more frequent naps later or to oversleep.
sentences.chinese: 这会打乱小睡的节奏或是干脆导致睡过头。

sentences.english: True short sleepers don't need naps or coffee.
sentences.chinese: 真正的短睡眠者不需要小睡或咖啡。

sentences.english: My first suggestion is to take a nap.
sentences.chinese: 我的第一个建议是小睡一会儿。

sentences.english: At home, he dozes for an hour after meals.
sentences.chinese: 在家，他饭后小睡一小时。

sentences.english: If you’re too tired to take other steps, taking a nap is easy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你太累了不能再做其他的事，小睡一会很容易。

sentences.english: Between-meal snacks to "wake up" are the solution when a power nap would be better.
sentences.chinese: 要解决这种疲惫，小睡会比下午茶得到更好的效果。

sentences.english: I napped for about one hour on the plane and it landed in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 在机上小睡了一个小时左右，飞机抵达香港。

sentences.english: As he walked into the room, he bent over the nap- ping mother, whose back was turned to him, and gave her a big kiss.
sentences.chinese: 他弯下腰，给了那位正背对着他小睡的产妇一个长吻。

sentences.english: She tuck the baby in his crib for a nap.
sentences.chinese: 她把婴儿裹好放在婴儿床里小睡一会儿。

sentences.english: So don't take a nap in the afternoon.
Van Gogh left the perfect spot for a pug puppy to stretch out for a spring nap.
sentences.chinese: 凡高留下了哈巴狗小狗的完美地点小睡的伸展出一春。

sentences.english: Take a nap or go to bed earlier instead.
sentences.chinese: 小睡一会或者晚上早些就寝。

sentences.english: Then one group took a 90-minute  snooze.
sentences.chinese: 他让其中一组人小睡了90分钟。

definition: to rest for a bit/to take a breather
sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
erhua variant of 打盹[da3 dun3]
